Reviews.Content: nothing special, shabby room nothing special, hotel in the 4th floor without elevator, service not friendly at all
Reviews.Author: Fraza9

Reviews.Content: good location, evil stairs I booked a dorm bed at Soggiorno Prestipino and got moved to Hotel Giappone. I ended up paying 20 Euro a night to live in a very clean, nice room by myself. Staff were nice, location was unbeatable - only complaint is that it is at the top of four flights of stairs and there is no lift.
Reviews.Author: tianguis

Reviews.Content: Good Location, in city, bad location in building Price is very good for the location. Room is ok.However, i was very surprised by the many flights of stairs i have to climb painfully with my heavy luggage. This would not be a problem if you are not travelling alone or if your luggage is not too heavy.
Reviews.Author: yayalala

Reviews.Content: Great spot for the money       view of the Duomo from the room's window
Reviews.Author: KJ118

Reviews.Content: Pretty good for the price...and great location For Italy, this place is pretty good. I paid 55 euros for a small single. It came with a bed and tv. I was 2 minutes away from the Duomo (and everything else). You can come and go at anytime of the day no matter how late. The place was above average for cleanliness in Italy. I liked it. The only potential problem was that my room faced a busy street so the traffic in the morning could be rather loud. If you're sensitive to noise I would suggest asking for a room in the back (they have them but I don't know what they look like). Excellent for budget traveling.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
